Uses of Class
io.netty.channel.epoll.EpollServerChannelConfig

  • Packages that use EpollServerChannelConfig 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel.epoll
    Optimized transport for linux which uses EPOLL Edge-Triggered Mode for maximal performance.
